Holly excrement Batman!!!
 
 I have been reading the socialist Ariel Dorfman's Heading South Looking North and have stumbled onto something eerie!--His father was an avowed communist infatuated with the Soviet Union, and even named Ariel after Lenin.
 
 I am informed on Latin American history and U.S. meddling therein--Arbenz, Allende, Bay of Pigs, Nicaragua, Somosa...the list is long.
 
 I have known for many years that the U.S. backed and supported the overthrow of the freely democratically elected Allende in 1973.
 
 What I did not know, or had forgotten long before 9-11-2001, was that the U.S. sponsored overthrow of a democratically elected president happened on the morning of TUESDAY SEPTEMBER 11.
 
 As the terrorist attack on New York happened on TUESDAY SEPTEMBER 11.
 
 And oddly, the anti-U.S. socialist Dorfman did not note this similarity.
 
 It gave me goosebumps when I connected the dots.

Holly excrement Batman!!!

 You can say that again. Maybe this is a bad case of cosmic karma? :p

You bring up an interesting conincidence. I disagree with what that appears to imply. I believe incidents much closer to home motivated the eventual attacks on 9/11/01.
 
 

 On September 11, 1990 President Bush Sr. addressed a joint session of Congress. He told them that there was a New World Order in which the nations of the world would unite to confront tyrants and prevent future dictators from rolling unopposed toward the horrors of more World Wars.
 - Saddam's Ties to Al Queda by Sam Pender p17
 

 

 Outraged at the presence of western infidels in Saudi Arabia, Bin Laden spoke out against the Saudi Royal Family-often. After the Gulf War, the Americans stayed to enforce the no-fly-zones over Iraq and to prevent Saddam from using his aircraft to commit genocide against his own people (UN resolution 814). Eventually, Bin Laden was ordered out of Saudi Arabia. He went to Sudan-the only ally of Saddam's  in the Gulf War (aside from Yasser Arafat).
 - Saddam's Ties to Al Queda by Sam Pender p17
